name: cutely
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a pleasant and attractive way: He smiled cutely at her. The living room looked small, but cutely decorated. See
cute
More examplesFewer examplesShe nodded her head cutely.William was a cutely innocent 12-year-old boy.They bought the cutely named "Rosebud Cottage" last year.
